question: Financial intelligence Unit (FIU) has imposed penalty on which payment gateway major, for violating anti-money laundering law?
explanation:
The Financial Intelligence Unit (FIU) has imposed a Rs 96 lakh penalty for the leading American online payment gateway giant PayPal.
The penalty is for the alleged contravention of the anti-money laundering law by the Company. FIU also accused PayPal for hiding suspect financial transactions. PayPal has been operating in India since 2017.
